content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 green bell pepper, finely chopped" )

content.text: 1) In a medium bowl, stir together the onion, tomato, celery, bell pepper, cheese, chili powder and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "stir"@21:25 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the onion"@35:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "tomato"@46:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "celery"@54:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "bell pepper"@62:73 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "cheese"@75:81 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "chili powder"@83:95 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt"@100:104 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a medium bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Arrange slices of bread on a baking sheet or broiling pan.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Arrange"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "slices of bread"@11:26 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "a baking sheet"@30:44 / TOOL )
		:gol ( tool-2-1 "broiling pan"@48:60 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Top each one with 1/4 of the mixture, spreading out to the edges.
4) Broil for 4 to 5 minutes, or until cheese melts.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Broil"@3:8 / AC
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "4 to 5 minutes"@13:27 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until cheese melts"@32:50 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
